name: Flame Sword Firebiter
text: You can Special Summon this card by tributing 1 face-up "Salamandra" equip spell. You can only Special Summon "Flame Sword Firebiter" once per turn this way. Once per turn: you can destroy 1 "Salamandra" card on the field; add 1 "Flame Sword" monster from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can banish this face-up card from the field; excavate the top 5 cards of your deck; add 1 "Flame Sword" or "Salamandra" cards, and send the rest to the GY.
